name: Avoid  PLC Copybooks using FIXED variable type declaration (PL1)
description: This rule searches all the PLC Copybooks procedures using FIXED variables declaration type.
output:
The report lists all the PLC Copybooks using FIXED variable type declaration.

It provides following information: 
-  PLC Copybooks full name
rationale: Scale of the numeric variable should be fixed. May lead to loss of precision while performing arithmetic operations
remediation: Try to reduce the use of FIXED in the declaration of the variables.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
